name: Unnamed Dungeon Game
description:
Started working on this around a month ago and just wanted to upload it somewhere. Currently only a partial level just to get opinions on the combat. Only a few of the items that currently exist are used.

Currently working on an equipment system and fixing the mess of a HUD system I threw together

Note: The "stutter" when hitting enemies is something that Capcom did in Dead Rising and I wanted to see if it would feel good here.
